description:
NTS Map: 083A05Starting from the Kerry Wood Nature Centre there is a 4km trail around Gaetz lakes. It passes through several different areas from open grass to mature forest. There are several viewing stands to observe wildlife. Many birds, deer and moose are frequently observed.

It's an easy walk accessible most of the year.
directions: East on 55th Street then north on 45th Ave to the Kerry Wood Nature centre where trail begins.
title: Gaetz Lakes Sanctuary
